AbilityDef.label: bestow: Legate
AbilityDef.description: Bestows the Legate title on a selected pawn. That pawn now has 46 honor. Can’t be cast on a pawn that’s already a Legate or higher. Has a 3 day cooldown.

AbilityDef.label: bestow: Viscount
AbilityDef.description: Bestows the Viscount title on a selected pawn. That pawn now has 76 honor. Can’t be cast on a pawn that’s already a Viscount or higher. Has a 3 day cooldown.
